timeline.message:
Add CrashlyticsReport JSON de/serialization

Uses firebase-encoders-json DataEncoder for serialization and
uses JsonReader manually for deserialization, as there is not yet
a firebase-decoders-json.

timeline.bodyText: I don't love this, but I won't push back too hard on it. It's just harder to make sure you deal with null upstream than to deal with an Exception.
timeline.author: bklimt

timeline.bodyText:
"Os" you're killing me. I'd argue that in a line with IOException, we should be able to call this parseOS. :-)
But I guess you want to match it match the name in the object, so whatever.
timeline.author: bklimt
